pull.title: Backports for 0.13.1
pull.body: Backport the remaining 0.13.1-backport tagged pulls. See individual commits for original pull information.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
Do not store witness txn in rejection cache

Github-Pull: #8525
Rebased-From: 34521e4d7d176109dedf52ec8ef2b5052b9a30f3

Add basic test for IsStandard witness transaction blinding

Github-Pull: #8525
Rebased-From: ca10a03addf70421893791c2c499e82fc494d60b

Remove createwitnessaddress

This RPC command is unsafe as it will return an address even if the script is invalid.

Rebased-From: 86c3f8db0bf64693313a81d5fe92ef603499030a

Remove maxuploadtargets recommended minimum

Allow changing BIP9 parameters on regtest

Implement SipHash in Python

Tests: refactor compact size serialization in mininode

Add support for compactblocks to mininode

Github-Pull: #8418
Rebased-From: 9a22a6c0891256f02f4906c1c13fb22a9722ec7c

Add p2p test for BIP 152 (compact blocks)

Github-Pull: #8418
Rebased-From: 45c7ddd109465e03551f5b39c2e650c243b4a078

Fix broken sendcmpct test in p2p-compactblocks.py

Python lambda use was incorrect.

sendcmpct messages need to be synchronized with RPC calls to generate().

Headers need to be synced (eg with getheaders) for cmpctblock announcements
to start.

Last test omitted sending a sendcmpct message.
